description: Returns the parameters of a non linear regression
name: Non Linear Regression

properties.name: dose.transformation
properties.description: Which transformation has already been applied to the dose values?

properties.name: n.predictions
properties.description: Number of predicted values to generate.

properties.name: response.output
properties.description: Comma-separated list of percentages of maximal response to generate predicted values for (for example, Y50 will give you the EC50 value as X50, Y50 being half the maximal response value).

properties.name: relative.response
properties.description: Whether to compute absolute (default) or relative effective doses.

properties.name: maximum.x
properties.description: Maximum value for the estimation of effective doses.
